column4: is there an issue with feisty repo's atm? I don't seem to able able to do and apt-get update no matter what sources I use...
I will do an upgrade, it's just a question of preparing a replacement machine, can't really have any downtime on the machine running feisty currently, it's a router :)
for such applications, distros like Ubuntu Server LTS or Debian stable seem more apropriate
Flannel, I usually use LTS on most of the machines i manage, but from memory i used feisty on this box because of a requirement I had which the LTS at the time didnt meet :)
